revised_title: Glyptodon Osteology: Skull and Vertebral Column
tldr: This article by Thomas Henry Huxley describes the osteology of the Glyptodon, an extinct genus of mammal. It focuses on the skull and vertebral column, providing a detailed history of the discovery and determination of the remains. The author presents a comprehensive analysis of the skeletal structure, contributing to the understanding of this prehistoric species.
